EmailTemplate.name: 201803_EMEAI_GDPR_EmailOpt-in_mih.201803_EMEAI_GDPR_Opt-inEmail1_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t Miss Out on the Latest Aerospace Developments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear valued customer,
From engines to avionics to inflight connectivity, Honeywell is constantly innovating safer, more efficient, more productive, and more comfortable in-flight experiences for our customers.
You’re important to us. Please click the button below to continue receiving marketing emails from Honeywell Aerospace on our product updates, news, events and special offer. If you do not click, we will no longer email you.
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We’ll continue to keep your information private and secure. We appreciate your trust in the Honeywell brand.
Sincerely,
Adam O'Neill Director of Communications Europe, Middle East, Africa & India Honeywell Aerospace
You can unsubscribe from our electronic communications at any time by clicking here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>.
